Hanzi: 厂

厰字的基本解释

厰
chǎng
同“厂1”。

厰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎng］
［《廣韻》昌兩切，上養，昌。］
［《廣韻》尺亮切，去漾，昌。］
亦作“厰1”。“厂3”的繁体字。
(1)犹棚舍。
(2)有空地可存放货物的栈房、店铺。
(3)明代在各地设立的征税机构。
(4)工场。
(5)明代的一种特务机构。
(6)工厂。
(7)同“敞”。宽绰。
(8)同“敞”。张开。

厰字的康熙字典解释
厰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
厰字的起名意思

同"厂"。

plant
Basic explanation of words
plant
chǎng
Same as "Factory 1".
plant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎng］
["Guang Yun" prosperous in two cuts, upper raising, prosperous. ]
["Guangyun" ruler is bright and cut, go to Yang, Chang. ]
Also known as "Factory 1". Traditional characters for "厂3".
(1) Still sheds.
(2) Warehouses and shops with vacant space for storing goods.
(3) The tax collection agencies established in various places in the Ming Dynasty.
(4) Workshop.
(5) A spy agency in the Ming Dynasty.
(6) Factory.
(7) Same as "open". Generous.
(8) Same as "open". Open.
